title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for g ′  ( x )=f ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@449E@ in any part of the problem.

· A response of g ″ (x)= f ′ (x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGNbGbayaaca GGOaGaamiEaiaacMcacqGH9aqpceWGMbGbauaacaGGOaGaamiEaiaa cMcaaaa@40A0@ or g ″ ( − 1 2 )= f ′ ( − 1 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGNbGbayaada qadaqaaiabgkHiTmaalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaaikdaaaaacaGLOaGa ayzkaaaeaaaaaaaaa8qacqGH9aqpceWGMbGbauaapaWaaeWaaeaacq GHsisldaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaIYaaaaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa @441C@ in part (b) is sufficient to earn the first point.

The interval [ 1,  3 ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWadaqaaiaaig dacaGGSaGaaGPaVlaaykW7caaIZaaacaGLBbGaayzxaaaaaa@402E@ can be reported ( 1,3 ),( 1,3 ], MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaaig dacaGGSaGaaG4maaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiaacYcadaqcWaqaaiaaigda caGGSaGaaG4maaGaayjkaiaaw2faaiaacYcaaaa@4228@ or ( 1,3 ]. title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

An answer of 1 with no supporting work earns the point.

Any work shown must be correct in order to earn the point.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for any presented consideration of x=−1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bGaeyypa0 JaeyOeI0IaaGymaaaa@3CA9@ and x=3. To earn the third point, a response must:

· have earned the first point,

· have no errors in the evaluation of g ( −1 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGNbGaaGjcVp aabmaabaGaeyOeI0IaaGymaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@3EAC@ and g ( 3 ), MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGNbGaaGjcVp aabmaabaGaaG4maaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiaacYcaaaa@3E71@

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for either h ′  ( x )= 1 g ( x )  ⋅  g ′  ( x ), MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGObGbauaaca aMi8+aaeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0ZaaSaaaeaa caaIXaaabaGaam4zaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPa aaaaGaaGjbVdbaaaaaaaaapeGaeyyXICTaaGjbV=aaceWGNbGbauaa caaMi8+aaeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaiilaaaa@5034@ h ′  ( 3 2 )= 1 g ( 3 2 )  ⋅  g ′  ( 3 2 ), MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGObGbauaaca aMi8+aaeWaaeaadaWcaaqaaiaaiodaaeaacaaIYaaaaaGaayjkaiaa wMcaaiabg2da9maalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaadEgacaaMi8+aaeWaae aadaWcaaqaaiaaiodaaeaacaaIYaaaaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaacaaM e8oeaaaaaaaaa8qacqGHflY1caaMe8+daiqadEgagaqbaiaayIW7da qadaqaamaalaaabaGaaG4maaqaaiaaikdaaaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGa aiilaaaa@51D8@ or 1   3 4    ⋅ ( −1 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaaig daaeaacaaMe8+aaSaaaeaacaaIZaaabaGaaGinaaaacaaMe8oaaiaa ysW7qaaaaaaaaaWdbiabgwSixlaaysW7paWaaeWaaeaacqGHsislca aIXaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaiOlaaaa@47E4@

To earn the second point a response must use the correct value of either g ( 3 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGNbGaaGjcVp aabmaabaWaaSaaaeaacaaIZaaabaGaaGOmaaaaaiaawIcacaGLPaaa aaa@3E8C@ or g ′  ( 3 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGNbGbauaaca aMi8+aaeWaaeaadaWcaaqaaiaaiodaaeaacaaIYaaaaaGaayjkaiaa wMcaaaaa@3E98@ (or both) in an expression for h ′ ( 3 2 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGObGbauaada qadaqaamaalaaabaGaaG4maaqaaiaaikdaaaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGa aiOlaaaa@3DBA@

The minimal answer that earns all 3 points is 1   3 4    ⋅ ( −1 ).
